<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Binding Coil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1018)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 173 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** Your Strike with the affixed weapon damages a creature

**Requirement** You're an expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3).
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman, a bright red coil that's warm to the touch and faintly resembles a serpent, wraps entirely around your weapon. When you activate this talisman's effect, attempt to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the creature you hit. On a success, rather than the normal Grapple effects, the coil instead wraps itself around the target with one end remaining attached to your weapon. Your opponent must succeed at a DC 20 [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) check to break free. The coil breaks if you move any further away from the bound opponent, but not if you move any closer.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
